DOC.brief_summary: In Crohn's Disease Patients - To evaluate the efficacy of TRK-170 - To evaluate the PK characteristics of TRK-170 - To assess the safety of TRK-170
DOC.brief_title: A Study of TRK-170 for the Treatment of Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Patient has a diagnosis of Crohn's Disease before screening Patient has stable disease activity Patient has had a clinically significant illness prior to screening Patient with clinically significant deviations in laboratory values
